attributes.action: We need a government of national unity to help us through these brexiting times
attributes.additional_details: I was a happy European.  Now feel need to find constructive solution...
attributes.background: With so much bad feeling (there appears to be such a huge gulf between the IN and the LEAVE voters ) we need some harmony, compromise and the very best expertise, from across the country (not political point scoring) in order to guide us, our economy and government through these uncertain times
